title: iGRATENS Farm Animals Figures Toys with Sound Books, 10PCS Farm Animals for Toddlers & Animal Sound Books with 10 Buttons, Farm Toys for Toddlers 3-5, Animal Lover Gifts for Kids
features: ANIMAL THEME TOY SET: 10 PCS farm animal figurines with 1* sounds book contains high quality PVC farm animals toys for kids 3-5 (Dog 、Cat 、Goose、Duck、Sheep 、Horse、Donkey、Rooster、Pig、Cow), non-toxic spray paint and detailed realistic shape design allows children to In the animal scene to obtain spatial imagination, animal identification ability, multi-sensory stimulation, farm animals toys and books with the perfect match to make learning more image, so that children enjoy the visual, auditory, tactile intuitive experience!

UNIQUE SHAPED DESIGN: Farm animal book with sounds is different from the traditional flat book design for animal head raised design, unique shaped interlaced design makes the animals more vivid and intuitive, attracting the attention and interest of toddlers.Die-cut pages design - each picture jumps off the page Perfect for preschool education. 10 exciting sound buttons, colorful illustrations of animals, a professional and fun text, and an interactive experience for children to learn about farm

DURABLE MATERIALS: Kids animal sound books are made of high quality paper, smooth surface and edges to ensure the safety of children's use, enough thickness and ABS cover make the book more thick and not easy to damage, suitable for long-term use. Suitable size and weight for carrying or storing on the go.Includes an on/off switch on the back cover to extend battery life.Small animals figures size is very suitable for children's hands to grasp

ABOUT THE AUTHOR: Anna is a senior illustrator and graphic designer. She has been over 20 years of experience in the education industry. Illustration is a great passion and on the basis of educational , significancefinds it an effective and creative way to convey a message or emotion. Inspired by her three and Inspired by her three and five year old boys who love different kinds of animals, she created this board book with the aim of bringing joy to children while educating them

PERFECT GIFT FOR CHILDREN: iGRATENS specializes in making children's developmental toys, sound books with animal figures are perfect for birthdays, Christmas, holidays, Halloween or other important days as a gift or reward. create a world of fun and education that will leave children beaming
description: Product Description Three button batteries (included) are required for point reading. Please place in a dry location for storage to avoid moisture vapor and extend the life of the batteries or paper. High-quality materials Multi-sensory experience Developing social skills Easy to carry and store Stimulating creativity Perfect Gift for Kids PERFECT GIFT CHOICE: Whether it's a birthday, holiday or special occasion, this toy is the perfect choice for your child! SUITABLE FOR MULTIPLE AGES: The design is suitable for children of different ages, meeting the simple cognitive needs of young children as well as the complex operational needs of slightly older children. Not only perfect preschool toys but can also cultivate children's interest in reading away from the hazards of computers cell phones and other electronic products. Education and Entertainment Comprehensive Playset Interactive learning Smooth, Strong and Durable Sound books are specially designed for kids with rich colorways and smooth edges.Board book's hard paper material is sturdy and durable, non-toxic and odorless, 100% safe for children. Realistic Farm Animals Figures Farm animal toys come with realistic details and highly reproducible animal features, allowing children to learn through play and recognize a variety of different farm animals, along with books to better understand and stimulate interest in animals. Push-button Control Push-button controlled book - button sensitive, small children's strength can easily trigger the sound effects, a variety of sounds, different effects experience to help children exercise visual auditory tactile development. ON&OFF switch on the back: can be turned off when not in use to extend battery life
